text:
Gove just scapegoated NHS clinitians big style! 

Marr quotes a govt document which confirms govt released elderly COVID-19 patients into care homes. 

Gove says those were 'clinical decisions' and 'clinicians' were in the lead.  

My jaw is on the floor.
